name: LSDToad
description:
Topic: Two Worlds

Your life is full of depression, you are looking for a way out. You start collecting different items which you can put into your "magic cauldron". Eventually you need your "special ingredients" -  your toad. By dropping the toad into the cauldron you enter your "escape world". There you meet different creatures. Is this your salvation?

Controls

Moving: WASD / Arrow-Keys

Player rotation: Mouse position

dropping objects: E

Fire: left mouse button

Contributed by: Pascal (Programming, Sounds, 3D),  Selina (Programming, 2D-Art), Leif-Eric (Level-Design), Julia (VFX, Shader, Programming, 2D-Art), Vicy (3D-Art),  Maxie (Programming), Gerrit (Project Managment, Level-Design)
